scenes.description: MC section where Takanashi Kiara introduces the final song of her 3D Birthday Concert.
Performance of the song 'Black Rock Shooter'.

subtitles.original: And I want to thank,
subtitles.english: And I want to thank,

subtitles.original: but I will do that with a song.
subtitles.english: but I will do that with a song.

subtitles.original: So please listen to that.
subtitles.english: So please listen to that.

subtitles.original: Last song.
subtitles.english: Last song.

subtitles.original: どうぞ!
subtitles.english: Please enjoy!

subtitles.original: Black★Rock Shooter / supercell
subtitles.english: Black★Rock Shooter / supercell

subtitles.original: Black Rock Shooter
subtitles.english: Black Rock Shooter

subtitles.original: どこへ行ったの?
subtitles.english: Where did you go?

subtitles.original: 聞こえますか?
subtitles.english: Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: OK, KFP! 回せ!
subtitles.english: OK, KFP! Spin them!

subtitles.original: 見てるか?
subtitles.english: Are you watching?

subtitles.original: あとどれだけ叫べばいいんだろう
subtitles.english: How much more do I have to shout?

subtitles.original: あとどれだけ泣けばいいんだろう
subtitles.english: How much more do I have to cry?

subtitles.original: もうやめて 私はもう走れない
subtitles.english: Stop it already, I can't run anymore

subtitles.original: いつか夢見た世界が閉じる
subtitles.english: The world I once dreamed of is closing

subtitles.original: 真っ暗で明かりもない
subtitles.english: It's pitch black, without a single light

subtitles.original: 崩れかけたこの道で
subtitles.english: On this path that's starting to crumble

subtitles.original: あるはずもないあの時の希望が見えた気がした
subtitles.english: I felt like I saw the hope from that time that shouldn't even exist

subtitles.original: どうして Black Rock Shooter 懐かしい記憶
subtitles.english: Why, Black Rock Shooter, those nostalgic memories?

subtitles.original: ただ楽しかったあの頃を
subtitles.english: Of those times when it was just fun

subtitles.original: Black Rock Shooter でも動けないよ
subtitles.english: Black Rock Shooter, but I can't move

subtitles.original: 闇を駆ける星に願いを
subtitles.english: A wish upon a star racing through the darkness

subtitles.original: もう一度だけ走るから
subtitles.english: Because I'll run just one more time

subtitles.original: 怖くて震える声で呟く
subtitles.english: Muttering with a voice trembling with fear

subtitles.original: 私の名前を呼んで
subtitles.english: Call out my name

subtitles.original: 夜明けを抱く空 境界線までの距離
subtitles.english: The sky embracing the dawn, the distance to the boundary

subtitles.original: あと一歩届かない
subtitles.english: Still one step away

subtitles.original: 堪えた涙があふれそうなの
subtitles.english: The tears I've held back are about to overflow

subtitles.original: 今下を向かないで 止まってしまう
subtitles.english: Don't look down now, or you'll come to a stop

subtitles.original: 未来を生きていたいんだ わかったの
subtitles.english: I want to live for the future, I've realized it

subtitles.original: 思い出して 強く 強く 信じるの
subtitles.english: Remembering it, strongly, strongly believing in it

subtitles.original: そうよ Black Rock Shooter 優しい匂い
subtitles.english: That's right, Black Rock Shooter, a gentle scent

subtitles.original: いたいよ つらいよ 飲み込む言葉
subtitles.english: It hurts, it's painful, words I swallow back

subtitles.original: Black Rock Shooter 動いてこの足!
subtitles.english: Black Rock Shooter, move, these feet of mine!

subtitles.original: 世界を越えて
subtitles.english: Crossing over the world

subtitles.original: 最初から分かっていた
subtitles.english: I knew it from the start

subtitles.original: ここにいることを
subtitles.english: That I'd be here

subtitles.original: 私の中の全ての勇気が
subtitles.english: All the courage inside of me

subtitles.original: 火を灯して
subtitles.english: Lights a fire

subtitles.original: もう逃げないよ
subtitles.english: I won't run away anymore

subtitles.original: Black Rock Shooter ひとりじゃないよ
subtitles.english: Black Rock Shooter, you're not alone

subtitles.original: 声をあげて泣いたって構わない
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry out loud

subtitles.original: Black Rock Shooter 見ていてくれる
subtitles.english: Black Rock Shooter, you're watching over me

subtitles.original: 今から始まるの
subtitles.english: It's starting from now

subtitles.original: 私の物語
subtitles.english: My story

subtitles.original: 忘れそうになったら この歌を
subtitles.english: If you're about to forget, sing this song
